title: 'Price is on much higher side for the material'
'Fabric is great but the elastic rubber band is easily lost.'
body: 'One of the best adjustable belt to use and the fabric material is good. Size is proper and looks great with both formals and casual wear. The small elastic rubber band to tuck the extra length is easily lost and not a good implementation. No extra available as well.'

title: 'Great fit
column5: This was my first time with a double D ring belt, and I was surprised with how good it was. I expected the belt to loosen over the day, but it didn't budge an inch. It's a bit of an effort to get it through all the hoops on the pants, but that's something to get used to. It comes with an elastic strap to tuck the ends of the belt and prevent it from flapping around. It's a good touch, but it makes it a bit more harder to get the belt through the hoops. The material seems durable, but it needs to be seen, how long it lasts with daily usage. Overall, I'd recommend this.

title: 'Inferior quality'
body: The cloth used to make the belt is light and the thickness is lot less than you'd expect. If the cloth used to make this belt isn't thick, you'd have it contort and make you feel uncomfortable

title: 'Perfect Fit!'
body: 'Excellent quality with a good fit. Looks good on formal & jeans. Recommended'

title: 'Face canvas belt'
body: 'The belt has only upper layer of cotton which is stitched over some undurable stuff. Based on its price it should listed as 50/-'

title: 'Over-priced belt that is not likely to last for a long time'
body: At this price point (Rs. 599/-) the customer should not expect more than an 'average' belt that will not last for a long time, unless it is USED ONLY OCCASIONALLY as a fashion accessory. Although the D-Ring buckle is made of metal, the canvas webbing of the belt and the leather patch at the end of the belt (held in place with single stitching) does not feel durable enough to withstand the rigours of daily use.

title: 'Also good for XXXXL size (Even 50-55 inch waist)'
body: If your waist measures 50 inch or even more on measuring tape, this could be a belt for you. It's sturdy as well and comfortable. Of course people with xl or xxl or xxxl size can also use this.
